fullText: Thou shalt not avenge, nor bear any grudge against the children of thy people, but thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself: I am the LORD.
blankedText: Thou shalt not {{blank}}, nor bear any {{blank}} against the children of thy people, but thou shalt {{blank}} thy {{blank}} as thyself: I am the LORD.
